sentences.en: A series of fortuitous advanced his career.
sentences.cn: 一系列的幸运事使他的事业一帆风顺.

sentences.en: A series of fortuitous circumstances advanced her career.
sentences.cn: 一系列的幸运事使她的事业一帆风顺.

sentences.en: Am very excited me in this fortuitous on the island.
sentences.cn: 在这个岛上的奇遇令我很兴奋.

sentences.en: Gifts of books and journals can often be quite fortuitous.
sentences.cn: 图书和期刊的赠阅可能往往带有相当的偶然性.

sentences.en: Her years with MMC would turn out to be fortuitous for Britney.
sentences.cn: 同米老鼠俱乐部在一起的年代后来给她带来了好运.

sentences.en: His call for the sixty - thousand - dollar check at the time had been purely fortuitous.
sentences.cn: 他在那时候要求六万块钱的支票压根儿是碰巧.

sentences.en: However, a fortuitous opportunity to let him a new leaf.
sentences.cn: 然而, 一次偶然的机遇让他改头换面,重新做人.

sentences.en: In a other word, verb " be " is the most fortuitous verb of change.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 动词 “ be ” 是个变化最不规则的动词.

sentences.en: Profits were enhanced by a fortuitous drop in the cost of raw materials.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是,由于原材料成本下降,利润增加了.

sentences.en: The meeting with Jack was fortuitous.
The occurrence of such things is by no means fortuitous.
sentences.cn: 出现这种问题绝不是偶然的.

sentences.en: The posterity for commemorates this fortuitous encounter to construct five Hushan in this.
sentences.cn: 后人为纪念这一奇遇在此建五虎山.

sentences.en: Their success is the result of a fortuitous combination of circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他们的成功是各种环境因素偶然联系在一起的幸运产物。

sentences.en: We knew each other by a chance ( fortuitous ) meeting .
sentences.cn: 我们在一次偶然的 邂逅 中认识.

sentences.en: Will this fortuitous reunion seal them together again?
sentences.cn: 究竟这双旧恋人的意外重逢会否开花结果?

sentences.en: You're not fortuitous , and existence needs you.

trans.tran_cn: 偶然发生的，偶然的，偶发
trans.tran_en: happening by chance, especially in a way that has a good result
